mapper.insert: insert into admin (id, name, password, role, phone, register_time, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update admin set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, password, role, phone, register_time, status from admin
